title: Update Contact section business email display text

requirements.summary: Change the displayed email text in the Contact Information card to the exact business email ID "thegoldenneedle07" while preserving existing styling.
acceptanceCriteria: The Contact Information card in the Contact section shows the email text exactly as "thegoldenneedle07".
The email is displayed using the existing muted styling consistent with the surrounding contact details (i.e., the same `text-muted-foreground` styling is preserved).
No other contact fields (phone numbers, location, form fields) are changed.

file_operations.description: Replace the currently displayed email text "info@goldenneedle.com" with exactly "thegoldenneedle07" in the Contact Information card, keeping the existing `text-muted-foreground` styling and leaving all other contact details unchanged.
